resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
nealrichardson commented on pull request #5357: ARROW-6530: [CI][Crossbow][R] Nightly R job doesn't install all dependencies
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5357
 
 
   The r/Dockerfile wasn't reading the list of package dependencies from the package DESCRIPTION file, so any time a dependency would be added, it would break. 
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

fields.description:
https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/2802

{code}
* checking for file './DESCRIPTION' ... OK
* preparing 'arrow':
* checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ... OK
* cleaning src
* running 'cleanup'
Error in loadVignetteBuilder(pkgdir, TRUE) : 
  vignette builder 'knitr' not found
Execution halted
Exited with code 1
{code}
fields.summary: [CI][Crossbow][R] Nightly R job doesn't install all dependencies
